message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I was thinking a 52-48 split might be more agreeable.  Remember, the pot shrinks with each round!
Come on, Bob! The money is shrinking for you, not me. 58-42 is a good compromise.
This is getting silly, Alice. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. 50-50, take it or leave it.
You're losing value, Bob! I'm being generous with 57-43. Take it before it's too late!
